resources.string: View, modify and delete accounts to send messages with
Press + in the top right corner to add a new account.
Only one account can be added for now.
Account will be logged out first, and cryptographic data on this device will be removed.
Test message sent; Check account management room for its arrival.
Use this to update your admin account and bot space. Note that migration does not exist yet.
User may send messages to this room in order to manage automated actions of account %s.

Before we begin, some settings must be done. Note that while you can change them in the future, migration does not exist yet. As a result, it would be very tedious. Therefore, it is best to set these as if they cannot be changed later.
First off, please enter an account name in the form of \'@username:example.com. The account entered will be used as admin account, and bots will respond to commands from this account.
Next, two spaces, messaging space and management space are specified.

Management space is NOT mandatory, but recommended. For every bot account you add to this app, a management room, initially between the management user and the bot, will be created. If this is set, this room will be created under that space, which would make things rather tidy.
%s has no permission to create child room in the management space. Please grant it first.
%s cannot locate management space. Please invite this account to that space first.
Failed to join messaging space. If the room is not public, you must send invitation to this account prior to adding account here.
